divs: Sighting DetailsMy 16 year old son reports having witnessed the above while at a retreat in Robbins Lodge in Davie Florida at approximately 3pm on Saturday, Feb 23, 2008. He became scared when he saw it and has not been able to erase it from his mind.
Summary: My son witnessed 3 black oval objects hovering in the sky -going slow
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Davie
There were no other sightings in Davie on or around February 23rd 2008
